text: I just got to read about <https://koka-lang.github.io/koka/doc/index.html|Koka>, it has really interesting <https://koka-lang.github.io/koka/doc/book.html|semantics>. ¿What are your thoughts on this new language?

attachments.title: The Koka Programming Language
attachments.text: Provides an automatically expanding table-of-contents in a side-panel next to the main content. The TOC must be in a `SidePanel` block, while all the other content must be in a `MainPanel`.

elements.text: I just got to read about
. ¿What are your thoughts on this new language?

text:
I haven't dived into it much, but I liked the idea of having `foo.bar` equivalent to `bar(foo)` . I'm sad it does not have multiple dispatch though.
Effect types are interesting, but I find code with effect handlers to be not so natural, although it just might be that I'm not used to it.

. I'm sad it does not have multiple dispatch though.

text: I briefly tried writing some stuff in Koka and while it is cool, its still really new. There is a lot of basic functionality with no documentation still.
